alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 10:35PM EDT until July 06 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Southern Sumter County in central South Carolina... East central Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 1115 PM EDT. * At 1035 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hebron to near Manning to near Elloree, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Manning, Summerton, Elloree, Alcolu, Santee State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Santee, Paxville, Poplar Creek Landing, Rimini, St. Paul, Stumphole Landing, Rocks Pond Campground and Marina, Foreston, Eautaw Springs, Indian Bluff Recreation Park, Gable, Davis Station, Creston and Blounts Landing. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 98 and 131. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Marion move away from the water and take shelter!
